name: places/ChIJTeVXnBBawokRUfcK7YU2KXg
formattedAddress: 90 West St #12M, New York, NY 10006, USA
adrFormatAddress: 90 West St #12M, New York, NY 10006, USA

originalText.text:
Hello,
Massive Bio, Inc. has been working with me for approximately 3 years now.  During that time, they have been nothing but willing to help me with whatever I need while on my journey of hope to beat this fight with cancer.  They helped me with Foundation One and NGS testing,  when I had never even heard of this, not even from my oncologist.  This team of people.  Doctors, nurses, nurse navigators, admin, and every member that I have spoken to, made it possible and opened the door for me to research and pursue matching clinical trials. Also, finding the assistance that I needed to go and receive trial screening a few hours away from home.  When I had some difficulty, they were immediately there to fix any bumps that existed.  I am very blessed to have team in my corner.  Special thanks to Dr. Diego,  Director  of Clinical Operations - Ann Stevens - BSN RN ,  Oncology Nurse Navigator - Kristina Hine,  amd Amanda M. Huntis- RN, BSN, VP of Clinical Operations.  If I left anyone out I apologize.  Not only did they assist me, they listened to my story. My cancer journey.  They listened to me cry and be disappointed with  our healthcare system, they listened to my frustration, and my fears.  They listened to me and respected my decisions.  I felt cared for. I have not felt pushed to the side or forgotten about for over 3 years. With their encouragement and diligent research, I feel that their is hope for me to end this journey one day and live out the rest of my life.

Thanks to all of you and to the founders of MassiveBio, Inc.

originalText.text: I reached out to Massive Bio to learn more about their services for my father, who has Lymphoma. We were hoping to find different treatment options and understand how clinical trials could serve my dad. The customer service representative I spoke to was very informative and helped me understand the clinical trial matching process.

text.text: I reached out to Massive Bio to learn more about their services for my father, who has Lymphoma. We were hoping to find different treatment options and understand how clinical trials could serve my dad. The customer service representative I spoke to was very informative and helped me understand the clinical trial matching process.

originalText.text: We reached out to Massive Bio for a second opinion regarding my Mothers breast cancer diagnosis. Massive Bio provided us with alternative treatment options which were clinically proven to be more effective and with less side effects than the standard level of care our oncologist suggested. Their team was quick to respond, extremely knowledgeable, answered all of our questions. They continue to follow her case, gladly reviewing any new scans and results. We are so grateful for the time and effort they continue to put into her case. Thank you Massive Bio for giving us hope again!

originalText.text:
I found the Massive Bio report to be comprehensive, well laid out , succinct and exactly what I needed to help guide me on this fight with cancer. The follow up call with the Doctor was invaluable. He described why he chose the 5 options for next steps for therapy.
We went a step further and challenged him with other options beyond the 5 proposed. He offered his honest opinion . Some of which were not in alignment with my oncologist but I appreciate the different outlooks . Obviously each doctor has different experiences and results that impact their decision. I expressed my theories on a couple therapies and he told me where my theory was flawed which again I appreciate.  Overall the report , the doctors visit and the follow up by Christy at Massive Bio are a great value for the money spent. I would highly recommend this service for anyone who is searching and researching their cancer therapy options.

originalText.text: I reached out to Massive Bio after learning of a recent breast cancer diagnosis of a family member. From free expert clinical trial matching to patient advocate support, Massive Bio was able to provide me with the necessary resources and knowledge to provide my family member the support they needed during their cancer journey.
